mapper.update: create table paper."${uuid}" ( id smallint not null primary key, type smallint not null, subject varchar not null, picture varchar, option_a varchar not null, option_b varchar not null, option_c varchar not null, option_d varchar not null, answer varchar not null );
mapper.insert: insert into paper."${uuid}"(id, type, subject, picture, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d, answer) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{subject}, #{picture}, #{optionA}, #{optionB}, #{optionC}, #{optionD}, #{answer})
mapper.select: select id, type, subject, picture, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d from paper."${uuid}"
select pi.id, pi.name,pr.score from "paper".paper_info as pi left join "paper".paper_record as pr on pr.user_id = #{userId} and pi.id = pr.id where pi.is_deleted = 0
